lines.text:
[while being questioned about the murder]
Mr. Perry very good friend. Chinese do not repay friendship with death.
Don't mind Ah Ling. He has a mania for quoting Confucius... and Charlie Chan.

[trying to pick out his assailant from a group of men in tuxedos]
They all look alike to me in that soup and fish getup.

[explaining the mechanism of Dr. Houghland's death]
They created the interstellar frequency, which is the death ray.
As Ah Ling would say... Even though the eyes may see, the mind will not believe.
Have you been holding that wire to the coast open?
I thought that television should be something more than just another form of amusement.
You realize it's possible for a man of experience, with brains and ambition, to go far in this business?
